assetProfile.address2: Plot No: 14 Chithamanur Village Kancheepuram District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: S&S Power Switchgear Limited designs, manufactures, and sells circuit breaker products for indoor and outdoor applications in India and internationally. The company offers spare parts and services; retrofit solutions, including circuit breaker and disconnector retrofit solutions; circuit breakers; medium voltage switchgear panels; and disconnector switches, such as center breaks, double breaks, and pantographs. It is also involved in first erection certificating, retrofitting, and refurbishing isolators. In addition, the company provides electrical controls; relay panels; automation solutions comprising light voltage control cubicles, control and relay panels, cooler control cubicles, remote tap changer control cubicles, and gas insulated switchgear panels; low voltage control cabinets; drive boxes and circuit breaker control panels; secondary engineering services; and business support and after sale services. Further, it engages in engineering, manufacturing, testing, and supplying protection systems and associated products, such as engineered and standard protection systems, battery chargers, and NER panels to utilities. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Maraimalai Nagar, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. V.  Ramachandran
companyOfficers.title: Sr. Gen. Mang. of Corp. Affairs
